# [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/pallets/flask/pull/2340?src=pr&el=h1) Report
> Merging [#2340](https://codecov.io/gh/pallets/flask/pull/2340?src=pr&el=desc) into [master](https://codecov.io/gh/pallets/flask/commit/d2a46dc56d9af45af2ea4eb43c23686b14a76b92?src=pr&el=desc) will **decrease** coverage by `0.27%`.
> The diff coverage is `n/a`.

[![Impacted file tree graph](https://codecov.io/gh/pallets/flask/pull/2340/graphs/tree.svg?token=Hvz3ovjQ9i&src=pr&height=150&width=650)](https://codecov.io/gh/pallets/flask/pull/2340?src=pr&el=tree)

```diff
@@            Coverage Diff             @@
##           master    #2340      +/-   ##
==========================================
- Coverage   92.82%   92.54%   -0.28%     
==========================================
  Files          45       46       +1     
  Lines        6355     6399      +44     
  Branches      498      503       +5     
==========================================
+ Hits         5899     5922      +23     
- Misses        335      354      +19     
- Partials      121      123       +2
```

| [tests/test\_apps/cliapp/factory.py](https://codecov.io/gh/pallets/flask/pull/2340?src=pr&el=tree#diff-dGVzdHMvdGVzdF9hcHBzL2NsaWFwcC9mYWN0b3J5LnB5) | `100% <0%> (ø)` | |

> `Δ = absolute <relative> (impact)`, `ø = not affected`, `? = missing data`
> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/pallets/flask/pull/2340?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [d2a46dc...1ee439a](https://codecov.io/gh/pallets/flask/pull/2340?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).

This reduces the number of jobs from 22 (previously 42) to 10, greatly reducing the wait time for Travis to test a PR. Periodically and before release, maintainers should run `tox` to get a much more comprehensive test report.
